default-mapping.title-includes: <MANDATORY - A STRING TO SEARCH IN TITLE (can be #SHOW#)>
default-mapping.title-excludes: <OPTIONAL - A STRING TO SEARCH IN TITLE>
copy-to: <OPTIONAL - ANOTHER DIRECTORY WHERE TO COPY THE FILE>
<OPTIONAL - YET ANOTHER DIRECTORY WHICH WILL HAVE A SUBDIR NAMED AFTER THE TITLE>/#TITLE#

mappings.show: <MANDATORY - NAME OF THE SHOW FOR DISPLAY PURPOSE ONLY>
mappings.betaseries-id: <OPTIONAL - The betaseries show id. If omitted, id will be retrieved from title>
mappings.title-includes: <MANDATORY - A STRING TO SEARCH IN TITLE (can be #SHOW#)>
mappings.title-excludes: <OPTIONAL - A STRING TO SEARCH IN TITLE>
copy-to: <OPTIONAL - ANOTHER DIRECTORY WHICH WILL HAVE A SUBDIR NAMED AFTER THE TITLE>/#TITLE#
